quest.name: The Chaser
journal:
Uin Nee wants help in testing a new love potion. What could possibly go wrong?

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Test the fake true love potion on the dozing Nu Mou in Pla Enni.

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Dearest mortal, is there anything more tragic than unrequited love? Nay! Nay, says I! Oh, the heartbreak! The pining! The woe! How could anyone with a shred of compassion in their heart ignore a mortal so besieged by melancholy longings!?

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Not me! And that's why I made a love potion! Well, a dream love potion. A real one would be downright creepy! We fae do have some scruples, you know.

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: The problem is, I'm new to all of this alchemy nonsense, and I have no idea if my potion will work! I keep trying to sneak up on sleeping Nu Mou to test it, but it's like they can smell me coming!

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: I'm sure that you could manage it, though! And I know you wouldn't want to stand in the way of true love! Well, fake true love. Well, dream fake true love. Anyway! Go and test the potion!

dialogue.name: NUMOU03716
dialogue.text: Goodness, if it isn't the very hero who restored to us the night!

dialogue.name: NUMOU03716
dialogue.text: What brings you here today? And looking so lovely, I might add! Yes... I daresay I've never seen such a divine visage in all my life...

dialogue.name: NUMOU03716
dialogue.text: W-Wait! I didn't mean to express my undying affectio─ Oh no! I've done it again!

dialogue.name: NUMOU03716
dialogue.text: Please, um... Please read this, when you have a moment. Which will likely be never, as I'm sure you're most busy being clever and courageous and─ Er, forget that I said anything!

dialogue.name: NUMOU03716
dialogue.text: Oh, I knew the leafmen would come for me! It was only a matter of time!

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Oooh, a letter written in fae! Let me see!

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Hmm... Oh dear... Well, that's─ Oooh. And... Ahahaha! Haha... Oh, that doesn't even rhyme! HahahaHAHAHA!

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Haha... <wheeze> Ahem! You probably shouldn't look at this. It's painfully embarrassing. For them, and also for you. But don't worry─the potion will wear off after a while, and they won't remember a thing!

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: It looks like I might need to water it down a bit for next time, though. There's smitten, and then there's...whatever in the name of Titania that drivel was supposed to be. Back to the cauldron I go!

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Huh. That's interesting. Now, if they had seen an irresistibly attractive leafman, it might still be usable, but that doesn't seem to be the case...

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Maybe it didn't work because Nu Mou are too different from you mortals? Or maybe that specific Nu Mou has a bizarre fixation on leafmen! I could check their dreams to make sure, but I'm a little afraid of what I might find...

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Best to try a different formula, I think! I can count on you to test a new batch when I'm done, right? Of course I can!
